post.body: Well, it worked for me...I chuckled :)
Now that's an interesting marketing strategy ;)
lol...I've always wished I could somehow potty train my dogs to use the toilet. :)
Not yet :( Hopefully that feature is coming soon
Hope it doesn't have anything to do with gastrointestinal!
These units are placed in the stores by the liquor distributors and are thrown out after use.
This may sound cheezy, but I see display units behind liquor stores often. These are perfect for your products and free!
I'm there :) http://tendigitcreations.artfire.com
....and in twenty years, you'll be here saying what I just said :) It goes fast....so enjoy life!
That's actually a very pretty belt!!
Oh yeah, forgot that part!! :)
Don't stress....it's their loss, right?? There's a big world out there...go get 'em!! :)
42, 91, 36, 84, 52....sorry, this is usually funny when someone is actively counting in your presence :)
Same here, only my house smells like Monkey Farts and Hazelnut Cappuccino...not sure they mesh well :)
Wow! Congrats!! And I thought I had been busy :)
I'm so jealous...only raindrops here :(
Same happened to me last night...was pleased with the fast results, but saddened about the non-payer. :(
Oh, don't worry, it tastes just terrible...all that crisp bacon, melted cheese, perfectly scrambled eggs.... :)
One word: washable :)
Enjoy the annoying moments....because you turn around and they are 15 and driving.
Indeed!! :) And congrats on the sales!
Only because I thought Captain Kirk (sp?) was hot when I was younger. :)
Both are cologne dupes...cool water is lighter than blue sugar. Blue sugar is my fave...what a man should smell like....YUM!
Oh crap...she's mad at me now....Beam Me Up Scottie!!!!
All Star Trek fans...follow aprillink....howz that?? ROFLMAO
Sorry, but that's even funnier :)
@Newfangled Go to the direct messages column to your right and use the drop down. Note: they have to be following you too
We have two soaps in our shop for men...Blue Sugar and Cool Water....he bathes, right? :)
Viagra emails?? lol
I wish we could "batch announce" things in all of our listings. Not everyone reads the shop announcements :(
Been there, done that...only we didn't get the email notification. Luckily we were looking at our website orders online.
Congrats!! I've had 4 sales thus far....I'll ship Christmas orders up until this Friday.
My condolences to you and your family
It does all the time! :) I never have to burn a candle because I'm always making them for others, so always a new smell
Four sales, not too shabby....just happy to be caught up for a change...it's been crazy busy around here! :)
Even worse is Caffeine Free Diet Coke....just drink water already :)
Your work is really beautiful!!
Can you send it Express mail?? lol
I've poured candles and packaged orders...now I can go have some breakfast....my favorite meal of the day!!
Perfume roll on available in 150 scents. Great stocking stuffer http://tinyurl.com/5lggsp
Got a 2nd mailbox to hold all of our packages...it's huge...I could almost fit inside :)
It's rainy here, but not that cold, about 62
Get your orders in by midnight for gauranteed shipping. We will continue to take orders and do all within our power to get them to you.
Good morning peeps and tweets!!!
Sold and relisted...our best seller http://tinyurl.com/67uupd
Good Night, ALL!
They come in shelf type, wire racks, wire hanging racks, etc...
Good evening fellow twits! Remember our deadline for Christmas orders will be 12/10/08. Oh yeah, it's our 13th wedding anniversary!
Perfect sized candles for stocking stuffers http://tinyurl.com/5tmm9w
Tomorrow is our 13th wedding anniversary! :)
Good Night twitterland!
Do you ever just look around and think, "I've really been out of school 20 years!?!"
Wish they made a $4.80 flat rate box in addition to the envelope....that would just be spectacular!
I'm having a fight with my tape dispenser....I'm losing!!
Pomegranate lip balm http://tinyurl.com/6b9a74
One of my favorite new fragrances we have http://tinyurl.com/6b9a74
Lately, I've been selling things that are close to expiring...that's always good news :)
Protect those lips http://tinyurl.com/6hjh2z
Attention drivers...if you aren't actually going to make a turn, please turn your blinker off. Thank you!
Sage & Pomegranate soap http://tinyurl.com/59o7cm
Your tart warmer is hungry.... http://tinyurl.com/5nlde3
Wholesale client just placed another order!! :o Add that to my list of things to do tonight :)
Does it bother anyone else when others don't use capitalization with their paypal account? I always go in and edit it.
For those of you who make crochet slippers...do you ever put a rubber sole on the bottom?? Would love that!
Just listed soaps and body butter....already buried on second page...sigh
Had to put this poor guy on sale...just pitiful, I tell ya http://tinyurl.com/558l35
Just got back from the post office, and of course, had to stop and get me a biscuit from Martin's....bacon, egg, and cheese...pure heaven!
Off to watch a movie I so deserve....
I have so many movies...not sure which one to watch...what's your favorite? Perhaps it'll strike my fancy and, if lucky, I'll have it here
I cannot believe Christmas is in 8 days!! Yowza!
Sold four of these candles in four days :) Monkey Farts http://tinyurl.com/3pkekd
Going to hubby's Christmas party tonight....yay, a reason to get dressed! :)
This is the first year we haven't put up a tree....there's just no room :( I have boxes, candles, and soap in every room of my home
However, our website will remain open http://www.tendigitgifts.com
Our shop will be temporarily closed 12/24 - 12/31 to prepare for our HUGE January blowout sale...you won't want to miss it!! :)
Warm Vanilla Sugar Whipped Body Butter...sold and relisted http://tinyurl.com/5jvc5n
December has been a great month for sales...thanks to all my wonderful customers!! :) Eight more sales and I hit 800!!
I want snow!!!
